name: Hero Escape
description:
A small LÖVE game that I made in about 30h of work in 2014.

Hero Escape is a turn-based mini game you can finish in one minute. Your task is to avoid traps and monsters and escape the level. Make use of spells that are stored in magical scrolls around the map. Be smart! 

After each run your score will be displayed. Try to reach your best!

Controls:

UP, DOWN, RIGHT, LEFT - for movement
ENTER - using spells

Note: The game can be ran on Mac using Wine or LÖVE 0.8.0 runtime.
